notes: Looks the same as a [[Terrorsleep]]. You will find them by stepping in a [[Strange Vortex (Teleporter)|Strange Vortex]], created when [[Minion of Gaz'haragoth|Gaz'haragoth's minions]] are slain.
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-300+}}|{{Ability|[[Life Drain]] Distance Attack|500-800|element=lifedrain}}|{{Ability|Some kind of beam|500-1000|element=?}} }}
name: Nightmare of Gaz'haragoth
strategy: Ignore them and run to the portal in the south-east. These creatures have instant respawn, after you killed them, they spawn again in a moment, so they should be avoided at any cost.
